mapper.select: SELECT sct.comment_id, sct.product_id, sct.user_id, ut.user_username, ut.user_profile_image_url, sct.comment_text, sct.create_date, sct.update_date, IFNULL(AVG(srrt.rating), 0) AS average_rating, COUNT(srrt.rating) AS rating_count FROM store_comment_tb sct LEFT JOIN store_review_rating_tb srrt ON srrt.comment_id = sct.comment_id LEFT JOIN user_tb ut ON ut.user_id = sct.user_id WHERE sct.product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY sct.comment_id, sct.product_id, sct.user_id, ut.user_username, sct.comment_text, sct.create_date, sct.update_date ORDER BY ${orderBy} LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT srrt.rating, COUNT(*) AS count FROM store_review_rating_tb srrt INNER JOIN store_comment_tb sct ON sct.comment_id = srrt.comment_id WHERE sct.product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY srrt.rating ORDER BY srrt.rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM store_comment_tb WHERE product_id = #{productId};
